meaningMnemonic: A thing that's <kanji>constant</kanji> for a <kanji>long time</kanji> becomes <vocabulary>permanent</vocabulary>. Leave a shoe on the sidewalk for a long time? Permanently stuck there. Constantly making dumb faces? Permanently stuck like that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
